0.title: Online Appointment scheduling
0.text: Know right away if your website is offline! Reliable monitoring saves you money by alerting you before any major problems arise.

1.title: Setup multiple calendars
1.text: You offer multiple services, do not worry, you can set separate calendars per service.

2.title: Google Integration
2.text: Virtual Meeting or just notification, we provide integration with Google Calendar.

3.title: Real-time notifications
3.text: You want to get notified when new booking has ocurred, we will send you an email, push notification or you can use our custom webhooks to link it with your service.
